The metope shown, from the Parthenon, conveys a sense of motion and drama through which of the following techniques?

choices.label: Figures depicted with composite poses in twisted perspective
Veristic presentation of the torso and limbs
Relief so high that some forms project beyond the picture plane
Off-balance composition that shows the sculptor’s technical skill

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
